chapters.title: Ravens
chapters.info: Alene al'Vere, p. [7]—Second oldest of five daughters of Marin and Bran al'Vere of Emond's Field. She loves to read, and ignores Egwene unless Egwene is presently reading a book that she herself wants to read—in this case, she usually takes it and proclaims it to be much too “complex” for Egwene to understand. See also al'Vere, Berowyn; al'Vere, Brandelwyn; al'Vere, Egwene; al'Vere, Elisa; al'Vere, Loise; al'Vere, Marin.
